body: They likely sold the bully girl to the yakuza or some other human trafficker. I doubt they killed her. Being able to hide a murder is beyond scope of these guys who appear to be low level crooks.
So sensei really loves her but he's twisted.
very nice. Wonder where Chapter 3 is?
Sensei keeps moving forward, until all the bullies who hurt his girlfriend are destroyed
@jaraxxus Ooh I didn't know that this one was first. Damn now that I think about it, if they actually did killed of Sasaki then that's f***ed up ngl teach...

That's not the previous girl, this is the previous girl. I think as part of the story, the author is trying to show that despite being trapped inside a very abusive relationship, Renge is having an emotional effect on the teacher, at least with enough progress that she was able to convince him not to kill the second bully, leaving her with trauma instead.
I'm pretty sure the previous girl who bullied Renge did actually returned but yeah she didn't look so great and have a trauma.
The morale of this story is to not go to a rape school
If classmates keep disappearing keeps up, someone will tie it to the fact that they all bullied Renge and then the teacher and that murderer will get caught.
Guess the morale of the story is don't be a bully
